    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Heredoc {
            parts: [
                Literal(
                    "Hello, world!\n",
                ),
            ],
        },
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span {
                line: 6,
                column: 4,
                position: 32,
            },
        ),
    },
]
